scripts.clean: rimraf resources/web/experiment/gen && rimraf resources/views/gen && rimraf resources/views/*.*
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development LK_MODULE_CONTAINER=platform LK_MODULE=pipeline webpack serve --config node_modules/@labkey/build/webpack/watch.config.js
scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development LK_MODULE_CONTAINER=platform LK_MODULE=pipeline webpack --config node_modules/@labkey/build/webpack/dev.config.js --color
scripts.build-prod: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production PROD_SOURCE_MAP=source-map LK_MODULE_CONTAINER=platform LK_MODULE=pipeline webpack --config node_modules/@labkey/build/webpack/prod.config.js --color --progress --profile
